thread.title: Lenovo K6 Power available without registrations on Flipkart, but only for today
thread.title_full: Lenovo K6 Power available without registrations on Flipkart, but only for today

title: Lenovo K6 Power available without registrations on Flipkart, but only for today
text:
Lenovo K6 Power available without registrations on Flipkart, but only for today Lenovo K6 Power available without registrations on Flipkart, but only for today By - March 7, 2017 “The K6 Power is a mid-range offering with a premium all-metal design and up to 4GB of RAM” 
Lenovo launched the K6 Power in India in November last year. Ever since the launch, the phone was being offered via weekly flash sales on Flipkart. However, today, the e-tailer is hosting a one-day open sale of the K6 Power. Both 3GB and 4GB RAM variants of the device are available directly, without registrations, on Flipkart today. 
The K6 Power’s 3GB RAM variant is being offered for Rs 9,999, while the 4GB model is available for Rs 10,999. Flipkart is also running an exchange offer on the device with up to Rs 9,000 exchange value. Also, there’s flat Rs 600 discount on the device on purchases made via HDFC bank credit cards, and five percent off on Axis bank Buzz credit cards. 
For the uninitiated, the Lenovo K6 Power ( first impressions ) is a mid-range Android smartphone featuring a premium all-metal unibody design, a rear-mounted fingerprint sensor and a 4,000mAh battery. It comes with a 5-inch full HD display, an octa-core Snapdragon 430 SoC, 13MP/8MP cameras, 4G, VoLTE, Dolby Atmos-powered speakers and Android Marshmallow. Facebook Comments
